sentences: Mami Ayukawa (鮎川 麻弥, Ayukawa Mami, born on March 29, 1961) is a Japanese singer from Shinjuku, Tokyo, Japan.
Yume Iro Chaser (夢色チェイサー), first opening theme song from TV series Metal Armor Dragonar (1987)
"Tsuioku Symphonia"/"Hatenai ano Sora e" (追憶シンフォニア/果てないあの宇宙へ, "Recollection Symphonia"/"To That Endless Universe") – Collaboration with Hiroko Moriguchi (October 23, 2019)
